text: Grover is an unincorporated community in Douglas County, Kansas. It is 4 miles west of Lecompton and 6 miles east of Tecumseh. ==History== Grover created a post office in 1886. It closed in 1895. It opened again in 1897, but it closed in 1899. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Douglas County, Kansas
title: Grover, Kansas
